verses.text: I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, From whence cometh my help.
My help \add cometh\add* from the \sc Lord\sc*, Which made heaven and earth.
He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: He that keepeth thee will not slumber.
Behold, he that keepeth Israel Shall neither slumber nor sleep.
The \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* thy keeper: The \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* thy shade upon thy right hand.
The sun shall not smite thee by day, Nor the moon by night.
The \sc Lord\sc* shall preserve thee from all evil: He shall preserve thy soul.
The \sc Lord\sc* shall preserve thy going out and thy coming in From this time forth, and \add even\add* for evermore.
